page.title: 18Conservation
page.content: One of the aims if the{Peak Park}is to conserve the landscape of the area and there is a great{awareness}as well as an inevitable{conflict of interests in this field. Planning controls on building aim to conserve a{traditional}look to the landscape, extensions to industry and quarries are considered very carefully and the{impact of tourism}and transport on the landscape has to be met. A number of national and local groups are actively involved in conservation activities such as planting trees, wildflowers or protecting wildlife etc There is a mixed response to these activities from local residents who may be involved or may consider their rights to be at risk. The Primary School has developed a{conservation {area}with trees, a pond etc.
